rows.label: qev091601_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh, look. The fun police.
Here to arrest me, fun police?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0002
rows.name: Save it, Murderess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0003
rows.name:
Look, if these lunks want to fight, it's their call,
but goading them on is tacky.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0004
rows.name: Goading? Who's goading?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0005
rows.name:
I just mentioned that I'd take the strongest one
along on the next mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0006
rows.name: Charming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0007
rows.name: Hey, more charming than you, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0008
rows.name: Though you seem to be doing all right today...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0009_m
rows.name: Especially considering the intriguing new friend you have there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0009_f
rows.name: Especially considering the intriguing new friend you have there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_JNK0010
rows.name: Greet

rows.label: qev091601_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell the Murderess that it's very nice to meet her.

rows.label: qev091601_JNK0020
rows.name: Flatter

rows.label: qev091601_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell the Murderess that she's
both observant AND beautiful.

rows.label: qev091601_JNK0030
rows.name: Downplay

rows.label: qev091601_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell the Murderess that you're nothing special.

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0010
rows.name: And so polite! What a catch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0011
rows.name: Flattery will get you everywhere. I like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0012
rows.name: Such humility! Now that's just delightful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0013
rows.name: What say you dump Ms. Sunshine here and come with me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0014
rows.name: Hands off, harpy. We're a team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0015
rows.name: Oh, fine. I'll join your team. Are you happy now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0016
rows.name: What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0017
rows.name: Aw, don't make that face, Irina. You know I love you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0018
rows.name:
Sure, we were born into two very different worlds,
but in the end, we grew up in the same one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0019
rows.name: We can at least pretend to be nice, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0020
rows.name:
Easy for you to say.
You shot me in the back on our last mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0021
rows.name:
What can I say? It seemed like
I could get two birds with one stone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0022
rows.name: You're terrible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0023
rows.name: Terribly glad to be TEAMMATES AGAIN! Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_JNK0040
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev091601_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that Irina should give her a try.

rows.label: qev091601_JNK0050
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev091601_SEL0051
rows.name: Turn down the Murderess.

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0024
rows.name: How did I know you would say that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0025
rows.name: Listen: this is a dangerous woman we're talking about here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0026
rows.name:
How is anyone supposed to trust somebody
who calls herself "Murderess"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0027
rows.name:
Sure, she's all smiles and sunshine now,
but you won't believe what she's capable of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0028
rows.name:
Didn't Mommy teach you to keep your mouth shut
if you didn't have anything nice to say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0029
rows.name:
I didn't HAVE a mother, Murderess.
And you know it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0030
rows.name: Ugh. So serious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0031
rows.name:
Anyway, let's hope it doesn't affect the mission.
We should get going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0032
rows.name:
We're on resource-gathering duty.
Fueling humanity's tomorrow today, am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0033
rows.name:
Typical Curator garbage.
Boring as hell, but it's a paycheck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0034
rows.name:
Fine. One mission with the little rich girl.
But then we're done![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0035
rows.name: Yes, thank you. Good call. Greeeat call.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0036
rows.name:
We're on resource-gathering duty.
Fueling humanity's tomorrow today, am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0037
rows.name: Didn't you hear? We said no. You're on your own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0038
rows.name:
Right, except I already signed you both up to help,
sooo...yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0039
rows.name: You little... Why am I not surprised.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091601_MSG0040
rows.name:
Fine. One mission with the little rich girl.
But then we're done![ST:wait ]
